external_references.description: ESET. (2016, October). En Route with Sednit - Part 2: Observing the Comings and Goings. Retrieved November 21, 2016.
Mueller, R. (2018, July 13). Indictment - United States of America vs. VIKTOR BORISOVICH NETYKSHO, et al. Retrieved September 13, 2018.

objects.description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) regularly deploys both publicly available (ex: [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002)) and custom password retrieval tools on victims.(Citation: ESET Sednit Part 2)(Citation: DOJ GRU Indictment Jul 2018)
